description: Street scene; shepherd and mounted shepherdess with cows and goats; dog left foreground in archway; tower with gate up; church and buildings behind city walls

title: Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain, plate 112 from "Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravés d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de Mr. Poullain"
